120a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' me tog rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu bkram zhes bya ba yod de/
120a5(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rab tu gtor ba'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos kyi
120a6(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spros kyi 'od zer ces bya ba/
120a7(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab des 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'dzig rte gyilam de'i yang 'dab ldan/ 'jis rten gyi
120b1(mdo sde): sa rgyas man ngan de bzhin gshegs pa spyan brgyad ces thab bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston// bcom ldan 'dus des/ byang chub sems dpang/
120b2(mdo sde): rgyal tshab sngon lam chen po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od btung nas rgya
120b3(mdo sde): ba bzugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sprin sreg byas pa'i 'od ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'du
120b4(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od ldan po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas/
120b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa rin
120b6(mdo sde): chen snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
120b7(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu bdug spos bdugs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gnyis gtsug tor can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston/
121a1(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gnyis 'od ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas
121a2(mdo sde): btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams srid pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi khyu mchog rnam par/
121a3(mdo sde): gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab srid pa gsum zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags
121a4(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
121a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu dmigs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
121a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa nam mkha'i rigs kyi khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag pa can zhes bya ba btang ngo //
121a7(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zad mi shes pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
121b1(mdo sde): chos kyang son to/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nges/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag
121b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi thams kun tu yongs su spangs zhes
121b3(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnga snga zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos rab gtong zhes bya
121b4(mdo sde): ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rjen gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun du khyu mchog ces pa bzhubs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
121b5(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' yul la mi gnas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang bdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgra rnam par bslabs zhes bya ba yod de/
121b6(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam par bsngags zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mchog gi tshogs
121b7(mdo sde): can zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sngon ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin du rab tu banas zhes bya ba bzhugs te//
122a1(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang rlung sems dpa' rgyal tshab pa rA dzA na zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dang chags na/ 'jig
122a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang
122a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' blo gros dpe med ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu dga' byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun gyi 'byung
122a4(mdo sde): gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
122a5(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
122a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten khams rgyu skar gyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba yod/
122a7(mdo sde): de na de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal cheb
122b1(mdo sde): spogs pa zhes bya ba dbang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jigs rten gyi khams gadrags kyi 'phreng ba bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'dugs pa'i 'od kyi
122b2(mdo sde): brjid dang la zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshub legs byin zhes bya ba bdung ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na
122b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges
122b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sangs rgyas chos 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
122b5(mdo sde): spyos nab khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chub ye shes dal ba 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang
122b6(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams su mungs rab tu lebs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba tog ni 'od zer zhes bya ba bcugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la/
122b7(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ri rab byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa zhes bya ba yod de//
123a1(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi zang po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
123a2(mdo sde): tshab mi 'khrug pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dang chags na/ 'jig rteran gyi khams mchog ces bya ba yod de/ der de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
123a3(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bdud rtsi'i sgra zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
123a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa pad+ma brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i
123a5(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
123a6(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyi bos byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsam pa ka dang ldan pa zhes
123a7(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
123b1(mdo sde): ma chis bzungs zhes bya 'a byung ngo // nga'i yang 'dab chabs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa rini cher brtsegs nas bya ba nan/
123b2(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu mthong zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'dzin
123b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams mdzangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzangs mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
123b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab sangs rgyas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
123b5(mdo sde): pa bde mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab badre ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
123b6(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ba zhes pa/
123b7(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bco ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces
124a1(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sem/
124a2(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab kun tu 'od ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba'i spos zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha'
124a3(mdo sde): 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon pa 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo //
124a4(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams blta na sdug ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
124a5(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan ldan zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab
124a6(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/
124a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sbyin mos zhes bya ba btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas kun
124b1(mdo sde): tu bas zhes bya ba yod de/ den pashi gshegs pa sgron ma 'jang zhes byab bathams / 'tsho gang gzhes la chos kyang son te/ bcom ldan 'dus des/ blang chub sams par/
124b2(mdo sde): rgyal tshab sar 'dzums ma yin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen drabs kun tu khebs zhes bya ba yod du/ drin de bzhin gshegs pa
124b3(mdo sde): rin chen 'bugs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpang rgyal tshang thong byer stogs zhes bya ba ba
124b4(mdo sde): ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te
124b5(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi khom thams cad 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chabs na/ 'jig rten
124b6(mdo sde): gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu sar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
124b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgyu sar gyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i rigs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de/
125a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
125a2(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam
125a3(mdo sde): mkha'i rna cha gdub kor rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
125a4(mdo sde): tshab bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab rags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon du bgrod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
125a5(mdo sde): ba bdud rtsi'i sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang son te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan med ces bya ba btang ngo //
125a6(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags nA/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos rigs btsun zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
125a7(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bting ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
125b1(mdo sde): khams shin tu rnam dag ces zla ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin cher lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston na/ bcom ldan 'das des
125b2(mdo sde): byung chung sems dang rgyal rigs btsun zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab rdzogs na// 'jig rten gyi khams rab srung shes bya ba yod de/ ngan de bzhin gshegs pa rin na
125b3(mdo sde): me tog sna tshogs me dog kun tu n+yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'jo zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab blo thos mtha'
125b4(mdo sde): yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthu dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs
125b5(mdo sde): te'atsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ba lang bdag ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig
125b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rin chen me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med rdul bral rnam par grol ba'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
125b7(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod
126a1(mdo sde): de nade na de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te// 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems/
126a2(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par snang byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen khang pa/
126a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba bangata ngo // de'i yang 'dab
126a4(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snying po can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
126a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grol ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de gshegs pa grol
126a6(mdo sde): ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab byams pa zhes bya btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig
126a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams me tog rab gtor ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'byung zhes bya ba bzugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
126b1(mdo sde): dpa rgyal tshab me tog gi gdugs me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me chog
126b2(mdo sde): gzugs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gser gdugs zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab
126b3(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa don yod go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
126b4(mdo sde): des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab log pa'i go cha bgos zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin ga
126b5(mdo sde): ba rnam par bsngags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skyed ces bya ba btang ngo //
126b6(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
126b7(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/
127a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba nas/ btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba
127a2(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig rnam dag
127a3(mdo sde): ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te
127a4(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rigs mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
127a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gsor zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sbyar ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
127a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab sde zhes bya ba bdang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thobs pa med pa'i 'tsha
127a7(mdo sde): lo zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'das pa rnam par gnon zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang /
127b1(mdo sde): bad ba nags ra/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams srid pa med ces bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa 'grokun rnam par 'joms mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
127b2(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid
127b3(mdo sde): gnyis can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis yang dag 'joms par mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
127b4(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mthong ma thag tu nges pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes mchog ces bya ba yod de/
127b5(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par
127b6(mdo sde): bltas pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas
127b7(mdo sde): ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gom pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo //
128a1(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
128a2(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rdo rje rnam par gnon zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams
128a3(mdo sde): sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
128a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen me tog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog ces bya ba
128a5(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams legs
128a6(mdo sde): 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bzhin gshegs pa da / ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar thung ba'i go mthogs pa med ces bya ba bzhugs/ tsho dang gnas la chos kyang stoH/ bcom ldan/
128a7(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha brtul bral sde zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang 'das chabs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po nas bya ba yod do// nan de bzhidan na/
128b1(mdo sde): pa 'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu gnon ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i
128b2(mdo sde): yang 'drab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ldan po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te//
128b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun po chen po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/
128b4(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'gro zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nyi ma sgron ma
128b5(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dad chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshon rtsi phung po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung
128b6(mdo sde): ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dri med 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang
128b7(mdo sde): ngo // de'i yang 'od ba chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams skar mda' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sar mda' sbon ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la
129a1(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'phel ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na// 'jig
129a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gong na med pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhigazhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
129a3(mdo sde): des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i gdugs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
129a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa rgyal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gi zhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnga sgra zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
129a5(mdo sde): 'dud chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
129a6(mdo sde): smyon te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs pa'i du zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs zhes bya ba
129a7(mdo sde): yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kyi sngon ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
129b1(mdo sde): tshab phyogs snang zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa la zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po rgyal po zhes
129b2(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thu bo zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags
129b3(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng gi zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
129b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/
129b5(mdo sde): den de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang sngon te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grags pa zhes
129b6(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod de/ dri na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
129b7(mdo sde): bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sprin ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
130a1(mdo sde): kun tu 'dzin zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
130a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtsi'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal bzang po zhes bya ba yod
130a3(mdo sde): de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
130a4(mdo sde): rgyal tshab shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi
130a5(mdo sde): g.yos pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phug sbas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
130a6(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
130a7(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos dpal
130b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na spos mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' /
130b2(mdo sde): rgyal tshab pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan khang pa zhes
130b3(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang sngon te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpal sras zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab
130b4(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas khebs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
130b5(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me
130b6(mdo sde): tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'jigs byed me tog mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
130b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbyangs mtha' yas nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang byed ces bya/
131a1(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dra ba can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
131a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab gnas rgyal po
131a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brjed med nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na// /
131a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams can dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na spos mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang sngon te/ bcom ldan 'das
131a5(mdo sde): des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'byor pas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid bral zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshes
131a6(mdo sde): pa bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phan 'dod ces bya ba btang /
131a7(mdo sde): ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa migs pa thams cad ston ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
131b1(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snga tshogs zhes bya ba/
131b2(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs bslags don yod ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rgyab go cha mthar
131b3(mdo sde): yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
131b4(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gtsug na nor bu zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya/
131b5(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das desabyang chub
131b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i snying stobs go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
131b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen tog ces bya ba
132a1(mdo sde): btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te
132a2(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nam mkha' rnam dag spyod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang /
132a3(mdo sde): byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
132a4(mdo sde): rgyal tsha ba bzang po dbyangs zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mar me byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas
132a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyu mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
132a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dri zhim zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
132a7(mdo sde): des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig bzangs zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
132b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa la lo sbyar ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rdul tshab rgya mtsho zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang rjod/
132b2(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad tshogs mtha' yas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
132b3(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshad med blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba
132b4(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phas ma pham pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
132b5(mdo sde): rgyal tshab phas ma pham pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon rtogs zhes bya ba
132b6(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags
132b7(mdo sde): na'ajig rten gyi khams spos 'das zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mtha' yas mu med spos zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang //
133a1(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
133a2(mdo sde): grong khyer zhes bya ba yod de/ ngan de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
133a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgron ma 'chang zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chabs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun//
133a4(mdo sde): po mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
133a5(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
133a6(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtul bas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od
133a7(mdo sde): ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
133b1(mdo sde): dpa rgyal tsha ba rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo do// de'i yang 'dang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i dpal nas bya
133b2(mdo sde): bsgrubs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba btung ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
133b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams dri zhim zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
133b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
133b5(mdo sde): pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbang pos byin zhes bya
133b6(mdo sde): ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung gnas zhes bya ba
133b7(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags
134a1(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te// /
134a2(mdo sde): 'jo zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes bsags zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na
134a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par bsam pa'i smon lam yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
134a4(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/
134a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer brgyan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gsheg pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
134a6(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun po rnam dag ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes
134a7(mdo sde): 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes spos zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
134b1(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khang pa ste/
134b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rnam par sems zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i
134b3(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes spos zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
134b4(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig
134b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams phyogs kyi lhun po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
134b6(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs su rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/
134b7(mdo sde): den de bzhin gshegs pa bde bdag ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi sgron ma
135a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grags dga' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul dral mchog ces/
135a2(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi mjed kyi bdag po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
135a3(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba
135a4(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dri ma med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags/
135a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba
135a6(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'adz+ra zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bdang ngo // de'i yang 'dab
135a7(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kya
135b1(mdo sde): skyon te/ bcom ldan 'das desna/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' ba zhes bya ba btung ngo // de'i yang 'dab rgyugs na/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams so sor byug yang /
135b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtsor 'jug rtsom pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gu zhes la chos kyang ston te bcom ldan
135b3(mdo sde): 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu brtsams pa'i go rje zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu so sor yang dag gnas
135b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer pad+ma sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gAzhes la
135b5(mdo sde): chos kyang sngon te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa'i nga ro rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
135b6(mdo sde): chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi sku
135b7(mdo sde): yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das desabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
136a1(mdo sde): kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
136a2(mdo sde): lung bstan to// de na de byang chub sems dpa' des snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
136a3(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de su'i lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs tshwar
136a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
136a5(mdo sde): gzhes la// 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/ mthu de lta bu de ni de'i yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
136a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
136a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o//
136b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i nus dbab par shesan song zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying
136b2(mdo sde): stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis pad+ma brgyad blangs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor to// de nas pad+ma de dag 'jig rten gyi
136b3(mdo sde): khams thams cad 'dus te/ 'jig rten gyi bar dag las 'das nas/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya kA lAn tA ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga lta ba der so sor
136b4(mdo sde): yang dag par 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'khor bzhi po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis de dag mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur to//
136b5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma de dag gis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pas pad+ma de dag la reg par mdzad nas
136b6(mdo sde): reg pa tsam gyis pad+ma de dag las kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dag mngon par byung ngo // byung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bsgo//
136b7(mdo sde): nas mi sdang bar gyur to// bam po brgyad pa/ mtha' yas mkhyen mnga' gang zag khyu mchog gtso// rang byung mtha' yas dza
137a1(mdo sde): rnams thugs su chud/ khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas rgya chen gda'// 'jig rten khams rnams kun tu snang bar mdzad// de dag sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan thos nas/
137a2(mdo sde): zhu ba'i khyad par kun tu zhu ba dang // sangs rgyas blta dang phyag kyang bgyi slad du// mkhas pa de dag rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mchis// byang chub go bgos dpa' bo gang mchi dag
137a3(mdo sde): mi mjed 'jig rten rnams su rab gnas pa// de dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste// de dag ming dang gzugs dang grags pas 'phags// de dag go cha'i dngos pos mi 'jigs shing /
137a4(mdo sde): sems can sman pa'i slad du yang dag zhugs// byang chub mchog la ji ltar reg 'gyur ba// 'jig rten rnam 'dren mchog la de dag zhug/ ci slad mngon du chos tshol bgyid ce na// bdud
137a5(mdo sde): rnams gzhom dang byang chub thob slad du// de nas zhu ba zhu ba'i sprul pa rnams// gang yin de la shAkya thub pas gsungs// 'dzin pas yang dag tshig gis de bstan nas// mi mchog
137a6(mdo sde): de yi tshig rnams thos gyur te// dga' zhing mgu la rje su yi rang nas// bde gshegs phyag 'tshal de dag 'khod par gyur// sprul pa de dag der ni mi snang nas// gang dag de bzhin gshegs la zhu
137a7(mdo sde): bcu// de dag gang nas mchis shing ming ci zhes// de tshe 'khor kyang spu rnams zing zhes byed// 'khor rnams bzhi po de dag gus pa yis// rgyal ba la ni zhu bar mi spo ste/ de tshe
137b1(mdo sde): dag tamam nga'i sgrul pa stsal/ darnye gathong kun dbyu bzad po byung // mithun pa rung 'dribra dgabang / sras nas kyang ni migang ma mthong bar/ de dag su lags du /
137b2(mdo sde): yi labs/ maben pa bshad cing the com pasal du gsol// smon lam dpa' bo ldan pa'i gon zhes// de yis byin gyis brdabs nas 'di lhags te/ gar phyogs kyi 'dzi
137b3(mdo sde): rnan khams kyi tshul/ grangs med dag nas de dag lpags pa yin// dpa' bo 'jig rten phan phyir bang lpags pa// rnam par bltas nas dong bar gyur ba ste/ bsam pa dang
137b4(mdo sde): byang chub phyir spyod pa// de yi smon lam de ni de 'dra'o// de dag dge bas nges par sangs rgyas mthong // de dag 'dir ni de la sgyid mi lhag/ tshul khrims kyis byung dman par
137b5(mdo sde): 'gyur te// thos pa mang zhing pha rol phyin pas 'phags// de dag thabs shes pa la shin tu bslabs// mngal gyi gnas su 'gro bar mi 'gyur te// 'khor ba'i tshen tshe rabs
137b6(mdo sde): rabs su// de dag chos kyi sems cad parjed mi 'gyur/ rtab tu sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon du zad/ rnab tu 'phags byarnams dang bogs par gyur/ dbya' ba chos
137b7(mdo sde): sems can 'dir mthong rnams// rtag byed la rab tu 'byung ba thob// mthong ma thab tu dge bas de 'dra ste// gang dag gzhan ma brjod pa de dag mang / dpa' bo de la yon tam
138a1(mdo sde): yod pa// mang du bsngags kyang mthar thug 'gyur ba med// dpa' bo shin tu gnas pa de yi ming // de tshe bud med gang gis thos gyur pa// de ni phyin chang
138a2(mdo sde): bud med mngos mi 'gyur// sems can dam pa'i mchog tu de 'gyur ro// skyes pa bud med gang gis ming thos shing // thos nas de la'ang dga' ba spyod byed la// sangs rgyas
138a3(mdo sde): zhing der smon lam 'debs byed pa// lus zhig nas ni der yang skye bar 'gyur// zhing yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba yin// skyes pa bud med 'on te gzhan yang rung // gang gis ming/
138a4(mdo sde): thos nam zhig dang byed pa// thams cad byang chub ched las nyams mi 'gyur// gang dag gcer bu'i sems can ma gtogs par// thos nas su zhig dga' ba skyed mi 'gyur// sangs//
138a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyis kyang de ni yod ma gsungs// 'on kyang de dag dge dang ldan par 'gyur// gang dag bsam pas ming yang thos pa ni// ji ltar rtsi yis sbyor rnams sel byed bzhin//
138a6(mdo sde): sems can de dag gis ni der ma mthong ba// byang chub don du des 'gyur the tsom med// gang zhig pa la sha yi 'dab thogs shing // de dang dir ni rtsi dang byed gyur
138a7(mdo sde): de tshe kun nas sman gyi stobs kyis su// sus kyang der ni me la tshim mi 'gyur// gang tshe sbrul gdug gzi brjid drag po yis// dug gang de dag mi gdug byed 'gyur te// sa
138b1(mdo sde): spya na kun tu ston byed na// de 'dra'i sman banos pas ni ci nig gyu/ sbrul bdug rdzi ni gang dag sdom byed pa// sprul de thams cad 'chi ba'i dus byed 'byur/ daltar rje smar 'dra ba'i mi/
138b2(mdo sde): dri ni// ming shes sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur// dem phyogs bcu dag tu bsngags pa na// dpa' bo nga yi ming ni sras thos pa// de yis ming gis las ni 'di byed de// bung
138b3(mdo sde): med gang zag la ni reg mi 'gyur// gang gis mthong dang bsti stang byed ci smos// den rgyal bas dge slong gang sprul pa// kun dag bzang po zhes ni bya ba des// rgyal bas de skad bslabs/
138b4(mdo sde): pade 'jug/ byang chub zhugs pa su mchis de la zhus// kun dga' bzang po go cha dpa' bo'i ming // 'jig rten khams 'dir yod ces ngas thos na// zhum pa med pa/
138b5(mdo sde): yid kyis brjod par bya// de ltar bde ba gshegs pas zab bstan pa// rgyal ba'i byang chub yid ches dka' ba yin// sems can dge bzung dang ldan pa lugs// da ltar /
138b6(mdo sde): nga'i tshe drung zad gnas// kun+da dga' 'di na sems can mthon yod de// de ring po nar 'khor du lpags par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po gang dag 'dir lpags pa'i/
138b7(mdo sde): sngags pa phyogs bcur bzlog mi nus// kun dga' bzang skyong rin chen 'byung gnas dang // dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang ni ded dpon bzang // yon tan sbas pa mkhas/
139a1(mdo sde): dang de bzhin du// dpa' bo bzang stobs gang yin de ltos// nu zhes bya ba dang ni tulA dang // bzang skyong de bzhin dge slong ci 'dra rnams// ji ltar
139a2(mdo sde): skyob gyur dge slong de dag ltos// de dag rnams kyis go cha de bsam yas// don yod ces ni yongs su bsngags gyur pa// de dag gis ni don yod go cha bgos// de dag
139a3(mdo sde): mthong ba'ang don yod 'gyur ba yin// de dag bsnyen bkur byed pa smos ci dgos// kun dga' gang su dag gis de dag mthong // gang dag su yis ming yang thos gyur pa// de dag
139a4(mdo sde): nam yang byang chub dog pa med// de dag nam du'ang log par lhung mi 'gyur// de dag thams cad brtson pas tshogs pa yin// de dag thams cad shes pas tshogs par gyur//
139a5(mdo sde): rtag tu tshul khrims phung pos de rtag gnas// thams cad theg pa mchog la de ltar 'dun// kun dga' sangs rgyas zhing 'dir phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten du ltar gang
139a6(mdo sde): dag su gnas pa// dpa' bo de ci bo cha 'dod gyur pa// de la rgyal ba kun gyis bsngags pa brjod// gang gis bsngags brjod rgyal ba de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe/
139a7(mdo sde): der shes te// shAkya khyu mchog 'jig rten mgon po dang // byang chub zhugs pa'i dpa' bo de dag blta'o// de thos nas kyang gsol ba btab gyur pa// mgon po mi
139b1(mdo sde): mjed 'jig rten khams su mchi// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la bskor byas nas// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad lhags// dge slong de dag gi rnyed thos nas
139b2(mdo sde): de tshe byang chub mchog tu 'dun pa skyed// gang dgra ming dang 'dun pas byang chub zhugs// de dag rgyal bas byang chub der lung bstan// bskal pa grangs med dag tu les byas shing // mi
139b3(mdo sde): dge bsdugs pa gang dag su yod po// de phyir sdigs ma'i dus na de dag ni// nga dang lhan cig sangs rgyas zhing du lhags// nga yi byang chub mchog 'di thob byur kyang // de tshe sems can pa
139b4(mdo sde): bar spro ba med// gang dag phyi dus dge slong rnams 'byung ba// rtsub dang gtum dang shin tu rtsub pa yin// de tshe kun tu 'jigs pa thob nas su// yang dang yang du brtson 'grus stobs spyad
139b5(mdo sde): cing // mu ge'i dus su rjen rjen sbyin pa byin// de dag rnams kyi sbyin pa rtsub pa yin// de dag 'di la gus pa che byas nas// phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po de yi tshe// srog kyang btang
139b6(mdo sde): nas don+da ni bya snyam ste// nga yi chos mchog spel zhing 'dzin par byeng // dus de na ni mi dge'i las rnams kyis// smon lam gnas kyang 'jig rten dag nA yod// 'di na
139b7(mdo sde): de dag ni byas pas na// de yi tshe na brnyas pa'i tshul du 'gyur// de dag der ni 'di 'dra'i chos thos nas// de tshe der ni chos min 'du shes 'gyur// chos 'di rgyal bas gsungs
140a1(mdo sde): pa ma yin zhes// 'jig rten phyin ci log la kun dga' ltos// de tshe dge slong slob pas 'du byed la// rtag pa cung zad med ces skyo thob pas/
140a2(mdo sde): de tshe mgo la me 'bar bzhin du rtogs// 'chi med thob par bya phyir ma lus brtsal// bstan 'di rab tu rnam par 'jig thob nas// der ni lnga yang sdug bsngal dag tu gyur// de
140a3(mdo sde): 'jigs pa mthong na mi rung zhes// da lta'i dus su shI yang sra sgyum sems// bag tsha med pa'i sgrogs pa spogs pa yi// drang srong che de de ring bdag cag mthong // 'dren pa mchog
140a4(mdo sde): gi zhal du lta byed cing // kye ma rgyal bas bshad ces yi rangs so// dge slong bsam gtan byed pa dag kyang mthong // dbang thob rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mkhas gyur pa// 'di
140a5(mdo sde): ni ting 'dzin shes rab pha rol phyin// de dag phyi ma'i dus su ji ltar mthong // sdig pa'i dge slong stobs dang ldan 'gyur zhing // de tshe tshul ldan shin tu tshar gcad 'gyur// gnas
140a6(mdo sde): khang gnas pa tshogs kyis 'thob 'gyur zhing // de tshe lha yid shin tu mi dga' 'gyur// kye ma kye ma bstan pa rab tu 'jig/ gang gi don du de tshe dka' spyod pa// de dag dge
140a7(mdo sde): slong sdig pas tshar gcad 'gyur// bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur ba 'di la ltos// 'dir ni phan tshun kun tu dga' bar 'gyur// nges pa rnams la de dag bsngags mini brjod//
140b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la ni 'khrug long byed pa dag/ de dag khyim na gnas pa 'dzin par 'gyur// dge bsten pa dang 'dre bar byed 'gyur zhing // de na de dag lag pa gcig tu byed// rgyal ba'i bstan/
140b2(mdo sde): la mgus gyur nas su// byang chub mchog kyang stong bar byed par 'gyur// dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu 'tshe 'gyur te// de dag rtag tu nges pa rnams kyis spangs//
140b3(mdo sde): mchog chug ma gyur ma rungs pa// de bzhin tshul khrims ldan pa rnam par spong // de tshe tshul khrims ldan pa dpyas 'gyur zhing // de tshe dge slong sdig pas brnyas tshul 'gyur//
140b4(mdo sde): rin phyin ci log gi dus su ni// skyo ba thob byos bag kyang yod par gyis// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la brtson 'grus skyed// de tshe 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i/
140b5(mdo sde): dge slong rnams dang 'phrad ma byed// de yi tshe na sdug bsngal gnas par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
140b6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos/ 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskums pa rkyong bar byed pa 'am/ brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad
140b7(mdo sde): cig des/ de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
141a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mno zas phyag 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnod/
141a2(mdo sde): pa chung ngum/ nyam nga ba nyung ngum/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar rig pa la gnas sam zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sa kun tu ston pa'i lham/
141a3(mdo sde): snyun gsol lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de spun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/
141a4(mdo sde): des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// / 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ldan zhes bya ba yod de/
141a5(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan med nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs dpyad
141a6(mdo sde): nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzin med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba
141a7(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan nyid gcig pas mchod ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i
141b1(mdo sde): mang 'ad ba chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan nyid med pa'i phyab rgya zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
141b2(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma rab tu gtor ba'i char pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rba/
141b3(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
141b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sna tshogs brtsegs zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam pa zhes bya yod de/ de na de bzhin dun
141b5(mdo sde): brdul med blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mu khyud 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo //
141b6(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
141b7(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshabs 'dzin rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' rnam par dag ces bya ba
142a1(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das/
142a2(mdo sde): des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen bdugs zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
142a3(mdo sde): rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba ut+pa la zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags
142a4(mdo sde): na'ajig rten gyi khams bde ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
142a5(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sems dpa' med ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
142a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad so sor bag yangs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
142a7(mdo sde): tshab zab mo 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan
142b1(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'gro ba 'dzin ces bya ba ba dang /
142b2(mdo sde): ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
142b3(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
142b4(mdo sde): gnod med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs par gshegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
142b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la dmar pos khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
142b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa spos kyis rgyags mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos
142b7(mdo sde): mchog lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gzigs zhes bya ba bzhug
143a1(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtul ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags/
143a2(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs chen zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
143a3(mdo sde): des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs shing 'jigs su rung bas mi
143a4(mdo sde): 'jigs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
143a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs su rab grags zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
143a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya ba ba
143a7(mdo sde): ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab snang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me sngon zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
143b1(mdo sde): chos kyang ston// bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'dzin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od byed ces bya ba
143b2(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'bar zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam
143b3(mdo sde): par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'dren zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gyen du
143b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shes rab mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
143b5(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi nor bu zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
143b6(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rab kyi blo zos zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
143b7(mdo sde): pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba
144a1(mdo sde): btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams nga ro can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba
144a2(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na
144a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par baspags zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
144a4(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten
144a5(mdo sde): gyi khams bde 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
144a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dkar zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams skya rengs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon/
144a7(mdo sde): tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ded dpon zhes bya ba btang ngo //
144b1(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston/
144b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dpal
144b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sem
144b4(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog/
144b5(mdo sde): ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen dbang phyug ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
144b6(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
144b7(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung
145a1(mdo sde): ba'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das/
145a2(mdo sde): des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes brtson 'grus zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de gshegs pa bde ba
145a3(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bde byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na
145a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams shing phos med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma mngon 'phags dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
145a5(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog bzang zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yo ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshes
145a6(mdo sde): pa rtag tu dpung mgo mtho zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu spro ba zhes bya ba btang ngo //
145a7(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu kun tu 'khrugs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
145b1(mdo sde): son/ bcom ldan 'das das/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab snying rjechen po 'i mgon zhes zlab ba // de'i yang 'ad ga gas / 'dzug nas kyi 'ams gartan bzlas /
145b2(mdo sde): pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa mtha' yas pas gnas pas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang son te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub se/
145b3(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas skabs kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
145b4(mdo sde): pa khyu mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshogs chen zhes bya ba btang ngo //
145b5(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUR+Ya'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
145b6(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sems tshad med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten
145b7(mdo sde): gyi khams gser 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des//
146a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig po che zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma smad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
146a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dmigs pa kun gyi khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dga' bo zhes
146a3(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'deb chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyis khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs mchog mtha' yas khyu
146a4(mdo sde): mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyan ras gzigs nges pa'i go cha zhes
146a5(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab la chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi 'phreng ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi 'phreng ba can de na/ de na de bzhin gshegs
146a6(mdo sde): pa rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo //
146a7(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen drabs khebs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
146b1(mdo sde): cang stod// bcom ldan 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rtab pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod de / ngan
146b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag nA pad+ma zhes bya ba ba
146b3(mdo sde): / de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
146b4(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chub mig rnam par ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag
146b5(mdo sde): ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
146b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gsung mdzad
146b7(mdo sde): ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab
147a1(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya skar zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mngon du 'phags zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la
147a2(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal mtshan sna
147a3(mdo sde): tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
147a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sna tshogs sde zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
147a5(mdo sde): pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
147a6(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod do/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skar mda' 'dzin ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
147a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yid gnyis rnam par 'joms zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan spos zhes
147b1(mdo sde): rdza ba zod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid gnyis pa narton ces bya ba zugs te/ 'tsho cing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab thams/
147b2(mdo sde): pa'i snga nas bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab gas na// 'jig rten gyi khams dpa' ba bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa zlab dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs
147b3(mdo sde): 'tsho cing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dang rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten
147b4(mdo sde): khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
147b5(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab don gyi blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
147b6(mdo sde): bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' bo zhes bya ba
147b7(mdo sde): btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/
148a1(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal man gyi blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
148a2(mdo sde): 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par bsgoms zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
148a3(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid gnyis
148a4(mdo sde): mnan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis thams cad yang dag par 'joms 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
148a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan can zhes bya ba yod de/
148a6(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa rim pa'i sras zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgron ma
148a7(mdo sde): 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
148b1(mdo sde): dang gnas la chos kyang spyod te/ bcom ldan 'das das/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pa shes gnyen zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'ad ba chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rlam/
148b2(mdo sde): mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i dpal 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'
148b3(mdo sde): rgyal tshab ye shes rab mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rab
148b4(mdo sde): btang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'dus des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thams cad bshes gnyen zhes bya ba btang ngo //
148b5(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sprin chen zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
148b6(mdo sde): 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skar rgyal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
148b7(mdo sde): pa pad+ma snang ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos 'phags zhes bya btang
149a1(mdo sde): // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa khyad par can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
149a2(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mngon du 'phags zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
149a3(mdo sde): khams dbang po'i gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
149a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bshes gnyen grags ldan zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod
149a5(mdo sde): dede na de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i lhun po mngon du 'phags zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
149a6(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
149a7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbang po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags
149b1(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
149b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsngags zhes bya ba yod
149b3(mdo sde): dede na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
149b4(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu rab brjod ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
149b5(mdo sde): yon tan dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spogs byed ces bya ba
149b6(mdo sde): btung ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zas kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pa med pa'i go n+da zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
149b7(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na
150a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan bsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang /
150a2(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'du ba chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dren pa'i rgyal
150a3(mdo sde): mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhe sla/ chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang
150a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na rin chen zhes bya ba btang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de la sogs pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med
150a5(mdo sde): pa dag rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan tA ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
150a6(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// / de'i tshe lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
150a7(mdo sde): med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mdzod gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
150b1(mdo sde): 'das des/ nga'i 'og tu 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// zhes byang chub sems dpa' rgyu skar gyi 'phreng
150b2(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyu skar gyi 'phreng bas snang ba chen po de mthong
150b3(mdo sde): ste/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsung bsal ba'i sgra zag pa de su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das
150b4(mdo sde): des bka' stsal pa/ rgyu skar gyi 'phreng ba 'di nas byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba
